properties.description: 日別ローテーションフォルダへ移動

source.sqlReaderQuery:
MERGE zz_order AS target
USING zz_order_tmp AS source ON (target.order_id = source.order_id)
WHEN MATCHED THEN
    UPDATE SET shop_cd = source.shop_cd,
                total = source.total,
                updt = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN
    INSERT (order_id, shop_cd, total, updt)
    VALUES (source.order_id, source.shop_cd, source.total, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP);
SELECT @@ROWCOUNT as count, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP as updt_dt;

sqlReaderQuery.value:
UPDATE zz_order	
SET	
    zz_order.total = zz_order_sum.total,	
    zz_order.updt = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP 	
FROM zz_order	
INNER JOIN (	
	select o1.order_id as order_id, sum (o2.qty * gs.price) as total
	 from zz_order o1
	 left join zz_odetail o2 on o2.order_id  = o1.order_id 
	 left join zz_goods gs on gs.goods_cd = o2.goods_cd 
	where o1.shop_cd = '@{pipeline().parameters.shop_cd}'
	 group by o1.order_id
) AS zz_order_sum	
ON zz_order_sum.order_id = zz_order.order_id;
SELECT @@ROWCOUNT as count, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP as updt_dt;

typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Column_1 as string,
		Column_2 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
source1 alterRow(upsertIf(true())) ~> alter1
alter1 sink(input(
		order_id as long,
		shop_cd as string,
		total as long,
		rgdt as timestamp,
		updt as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:true,
	keys:['order_id'],
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		order_id = Column_1,
		shop_cd = Column_2
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> sink1

parameters{
	shop_cd as string
}
source(output(
		order_id as long,
		shop_cd as string,
		total as long,
		rgdt as timestamp,
		updt as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> Order
source(output(
		odetail_id as long,
		order_id as long,
		shop_cd as string,
		goods_cd as string,
		qty as integer,
		rgdt as timestamp,
		updt as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> Odtail
source(output(
		shop_cd as string,
		goods_cd as string,
		name as string,
		price as integer,
		rgdt as timestamp,
		updt as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> Goods
JoinGoods aggregate(groupBy(order_id),
	total = sum(qty*price)) ~> SumOdtail
Odtail, Goods join(Odtail@goods_cd == Goods@goods_cd,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinGoods
Order filter(shop_cd == $shop_cd) ~> FilterOrder
FilterOrder, SumOdtail join(Order@order_id == SumOdtail@order_id,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinSumOdtail
JoinSumOdtail alterRow(updateIf(true())) ~> AlterRowOrder
AlterRowOrder sink(input(
		order_id as long,
		shop_cd as string,
		total as long,
		rgdt as timestamp,
		updt as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:true,
	upsertable:false,
	keys:['order_id'],
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		order_id = SumOdtail@order_id,
		total = SumOdtail@total
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> SinkOrder
